# @entur/react-native-traveller

React Native modules for the Abt Mobile Token client SDK

## Installation

// TODO: UPDATE

```sh
npm install @entur/react-native-traveller
```

## Usage

```js
import EnturTraveller from '@entur/react-native-traveller'

// ...
```
